拈.definition: to nip; to grasp with the fingers; to fiddle with; Taiwan pr. [nian2]

拈指.definition: a snap of the fingers; a short moment; in a flash; in the twinkling of an eye

拈花惹草.definition: lit. to pick the flowers and trample the grass (idiom); fig. to womanize; to frequent brothels; to sow one's wild oats
